std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Anna Sophia Smith"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Colesberg, Baptism register, 1837-1843. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G16 3/2. Note: Colesberg established 1826 from Graaff-Reinet. Transcribed by Annelie Els, independently, from Pretoria Archives FK 2277
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with anna sophia anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Anna Sophia Smith baptism on 8 Apr 1838 (born 4 Feb 1839), daughter of Petrus Erasmus Johannes Smith & Anna Dorothea Willemina vd Merwe.

std_narrative.citation:
Anna, daughter of Petrus Erasmus Johannes Smith & Anna Dorothea Willemina vd Merwe, was born on 4 February 1839 and baptised on 8 April 1838. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Anna Sophia Smith"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Colesberg, Baptism register, 1837-1843. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G16 3/2. Note: Colesberg established 1826 from Graaff-Reinet. Transcribed by Annelie Els, independently, from Pretoria Archives FK 2277
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with anna sophia anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Anna Sophia Smith baptism on 8 Apr 1838 (born 4 Feb 1839), daughter of Petrus Erasmus Johannes Smith & Anna Dorothea Willemina vd Merwe.
